question: Who has been elected as the president of the Archery Association of India (AAI)?
explanation: BVP Rao, who represented Archery Association of Assam, has been elected as the president of the Archery Association of India (AAI) in the controversial  polls held under a High Court-appointed administrator.  Rao beat Rupak Debroy of Tripura at the elections held at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in New Delhi.
